00039     ~ParserYAML() {
00040         _file.close();
00041         for (int i = _parser_list.size()-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00042             if (_parser_list[i] == this && i == 0) { // Final delete
00043                 _parser_list.clear();
00044                 _errors.clear();
00045                 _warnings.clear();
00046                 _object_list.clear();
00047                 _light_list.clear();
00048                 _texture_list.clear();
00049                 _camera_list.clear();
00050                 _matrix_param.clear();
00051             }
00052             else if (_parser_list[i] == this) {
00053                 _parser_list.pop_back();
00054                 break;
00055             }
00056             else
00057                 delete _parser_list[i];
00058         }
00059     }

00080     void show_logs() {
00081         using namespace std;
00082         cout << "ERRORS/WARNINGS/INFO" << endl << endl;

00096     std::string lower(std::string str) {
00097         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < str.size(); i++) {
00098             str[i] = tolower(str[i]);
00099         }
00100         return str;

00106     static bool already_searched(std::string filename)
00107     {
00108         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _parser_list.size(); i++) {
00109             if (_parser_list[i]->get_filename() == filename) return true;
00110         }
00111         return false;
00112     }
